column4: Hello, what am I supposed to do to upgrade a Gutsy (7.10) server? Looks like the repositories don't exist anymore?
most people in your situation end up doing a fresh install & reconfigure
BaudThief, ah I see - maybe I'll check out if I can find any old repositories available, if not then do a fresh install yep.
I looked, I think chasing thru the old repos to upgrade is more trouble than it's worth, not to mention unsupported, but it's your choice to try if you want...
